name: FEED (Astok)
description:
Credits:

Creepslime - musician, level designer, tile designer

Mjoonlight - director, sprite artist

Xrsexem - programmer, sound effects designer

The scientists have crafted beautiful mech suits for plants to occupy so that they might analyze what they think and want.

Little do they know, the plants they have abducted only wish for one thing.

To feed.

You've been hungry all your life, and now you at last have the chance to feast. Destroy everyone in your sight and devour their remains. 

Controls

E - switch from chainsaw to drill

Right Mouse - use melee weapon

Left Mouse - shoot gun

Spacebar - launch mouth at bodies to eat them

Shooting consumes ammo, and if you run of of ammo, consumes health

Eating bodies gives ammo and health
